Blueberries contains the following nutrients:

  • Vitamin C
  • Vitamin K
  • Manganese
  • Fiber
  • Copper

Blueberries are considered health beneficial, and said to include the following benefits:

  • Cholesterol reduction
  • Anti-aging
  • Preserves eyesight
  • Brain health
  • Help digestion
  • Fight cancer

  • Vitamin C
  • Vitamin K
  • Manganese
  • Fiber

Blackberries are very low in calories and carbohydrates, contains no fat, and are still rich in:

  • Bioflavanoids
  • Vitamin C
  • Fiber
  • Vitamin A
  • Vitamin E
  • Vitamin K

The dark blue color indicates its' high levels of antioxidants. Consumption is said to include the following benefits:

  • Promotes healthy tightening of skin tissue
  • Keeps the brain alert and helps improve memory
  • Reduce intestinal inflammation
  • Cancer preventive properties
  • Reduces risk of heart diseases

Beware of blackcurrant that has turned orange, that is sign of a serious fungal disease.
